overview: Sean joins SK telecom ventures with over 10 years of R&D and business development experience at SK telecom. He primarily focuses on mobile/wireless, communication and service. Before joining SK telecom ventures, Sean served as Sr. Director of Technology Partnerships at SK telecom Americas, where he was responsible for pursuing investment opportunities and partnerships with promising U.S. technologies on behalf of SK telecom as well as its many global technology ventures. Prior to SK telecom Americas, he led research projects at SK telecomâ€™s R&D Center and participated in the acquisition of the WiMAX service license in Korea. Sean holds BS, MS and Ph.D degrees in Electrical Engineering from Yonsei University, Korea. Sean is based in Menlo Park, California.
